article_title: A Hospital ETF to Capture the Healthcare Expansion
article_text:
I do the “ETF of the Week” for MarketWatch every week on Chuck Jaffe’s MoneyLife Show where I highlight big movers and disappointments among exchange traded funds.

On Thursday, I looked at the iShares U.S. Healthcare Providers ETF (NYSEArca: IHF). As more Americans join the healthcare system through Obamacare, hospitals will enjoy more clients.

Click here to listen to the podcast.

To access previous podcasts, take a look at our podcasts category.

The opinions and forecasts expressed herein are solely those of Tom Lydon, and may not actually come to pass. Information on this site should not be used or construed as an offer to sell, a solicitation of an offer to buy, or a recommendation for any product.

article_metadata.description: Tom Lydon and Chuck Jaffe go over the ETF of the Week.
